definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: BesGas Three has remained in operation for decades since.
sentences.chinese: 此后，贝斯平第三气体精炼厂持续运转了几十年。

sentences.english: By chance, he discovered BesGas Three along the way.
sentences.chinese: 他在路上意外发现了贝斯平第三气体精炼厂。

sentences.english: “The refinery was just hemorrhaging benzene into the atmosphere, ” she says.
sentences.chinese: 她说“精炼厂一直在向空气中排放苯。”

sentences.english: Place down the finished Power Plant and que another Refinery.
sentences.chinese: 放下完成的电厂并建造另一个精炼厂。

sentences.english: It catalogued several pieces of potentially exposed computer hardware used at the refinery.
sentences.chinese: 报告同样分类列出了精炼厂中可能暴露的计算机硬件。

sentences.english: Place the finished Refinery on your main field and que another Refinery.
sentences.chinese: 在你的主矿区放下完成的精炼厂制造另一个精炼厂。

sentences.english: Place the finished Refinery on your main field and que another Refinery.
sentences.chinese: 在你的主矿区放下完成的精炼厂制造另一个精炼厂。

sentences.english: Shortly afterwards, the Empire took control of Bespin and all its refineries.
sentences.chinese: 没过多久，帝国控制了贝斯平及其所有精炼厂。

sentences.english: Build Refinery, place it down facing the nearest Tiberium Field.
sentences.chinese: 建造T矿精炼厂，并让他面对最近的T矿矿区。

sentences.english: They fly over what looks like a small refinery.
sentences.chinese: 他们飞过一个看上去上个精炼厂的建筑。

sentences.english: Indiana’s shore is still lined with steel plants and refineries.
sentences.chinese: 印第安纳州的湖滨仍然矗立着大量的钢铁厂和精炼厂。
